Creator: Prouvé, Victor Emile, 1858-1943, artist
Description: The main image is a full-length depiction of an Arabic man in traditional Middle Eastern clothing. He rides a horse and carries a large flag in his right hand. The smaller images depict North African plants, including palm trees and cacti.

Subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918--Propaganda; Posters; Lithographs; World War, 1914-1918--Art and the war; World War, 1914-1918--France; France--Colonies
Title: Ce que nous devons à nos colonies
